home_item1_subtitle: European Food & Beverage Hub | IFS Network
home_item1_additionalText: From R&D design to industrial production: your single partner for functional beverages and food supplements
home_item1_hoverText: European Leadership Position: Ranked in Top Professional Platforms, GRG Group is the central player in sourcing and industrialization in Europe (France, Spain, Italy, Germany, Benelux).
home_item2_additionalText: Secure and optimize each step of your industrial value chain
home_item2_hoverText: We combine scientific engineering and industrial power to transform your concepts into certified finished products, without compromising on food safety.
home_item3_additionalText: Anticipate market trends to offer agile and high-performance production solutions
home_item3_hoverText: We support brands in their growth with technical rigor and flexibility, ensuring rapid access to international markets.
home_item4_additionalText: The unique alliance between flavor creativity and IFS Food production standards
home_item4_hoverText: Our priority: high-precision production, compliant with the strictest standards, for products that meet global consumer requirements.
home_item5_additionalText: A single interface to coordinate your entire industrial development
home_item5_hoverText: We act as your outsourced technical office, transforming industrial complexity into a smooth process, from prototyping to shelf placement.
products_item1_hoverText: International supplier of BPANI aluminum cans (empty) for producers. Low MOQ possible through a network of traders and pooled purchases to optimize your production cost (25cl, 33cl, 50cl and more on request).
products_item2_hoverText: Our flagship since 2007. Total mastery of glass, RPET and BPANI cans. We offer flexible MOQs to secure the launch of your innovative projects.
products_item3_hoverText: Production engineering for health/wellness capsules and powders. Combination of advanced scientific formulation and premium active ingredient sourcing for batches from 300 kg.
products_item4_hoverText: The future of food supplements: tasty galenic forms with patented active ingredient integration. Development of customized solutions from 5,000 units.
products_item5_hoverText: The ultimate nomadic and ecological alternative. Access over 36 proprietary recipes immediately available for international deployment under your own brand.
services_item1_hoverText: Technological mastery of packaging: filling BPANI cans, PET/RPET or glass bottles. Single-dose sachets, boxing, flatback, doypack, pilbox.
services_item2_hoverText: Creation of beverage and supplement recipes according to your objectives: energy, wellness, sports, focus or sleep. We perform ingredient mapping, samples and technical sheets.
services_item3_hoverText: Operational excellence guaranteed by the highest standards: IFS Food, HACCP, DPG, Halal. The certainty of total food safety.
services_item4_hoverText: A robust infrastructure strategically located in Europe to ensure ultra-reactive logistics. Worldwide capability with lines in USA and Asia depending on your target market.
services_item5_hoverText: Compliance management, graphic creation and visual identity for your brands, from idea to finished product: our technical teams support each development step.
about_item1_hoverText: Since 2007, GRG Group has been the strategic partner of agri-food brands. More than a co-packer, we are an integrated solutions hub.
about_item2_hoverText: European production network securing your supply chains: Beverage Division (16 lines) and Nutraceutical Division (7 lines). 3 integrated R&D laboratories.
about_item3_hoverText: Access to a catalog of proven formulas (Energy Drinks, Isotonic Drinks, Effervescents) for accelerated Time-to-Market on an international scale.
about_item4_hoverText: Creative packaging solutions, with the possibility to partially or fully delegate this phase according to your strategic needs.
about_item5_hoverText: GRG Group secures every project step, from idea to market launch, with the flexibility of a human-sized partner and the strength of a European network.
